review_data.content: Great service, I love the food, the terrace is just wow and the price is light (for Zurich). The Tartar is to die for! The sour cream ice-cream delicious. And the salad!

review_data.title: Great food and service
review_data.content: Always have an excellent experience here with excellent well priced food and wine list - even PIMMS! Beef tartare with truffle is a must as is the fresh salad to start and warm chocolate fondant to finish!

review_data.title: Excellent food in a beautiful garden

review_data.title: Nice summer evening
review_data.content: All was great but guys warn beer really spoils it. I know you want to sell the wine but come on. The salmon was raw my wife stopped eating. Must be a misunderstanding as we didn't order sushi.

review_data.title: Excellent ambience
review_data.content: This place looks a bit casual and alternative and it is but it is great. The waiters are polite and helpful and the garden is ideal on a hot evening. The menu is a bit limited but very good. Highly recomendable for a pleasant ,...More

review_data.title: excelent food
review_data.content: the atmosphere is really nice, feel from the first minute like at home. the kitchen fits the seasons. the waiters are friendly and very easygoing, and the chef is just amazing!!

review_data.title: Great in Summer
review_data.content: This setting is beautiful to sit in the summer outside. The food is ok. The fountain in the backdrop with the beautiful courtyard give the visitor the feeling that he is 100 years in the past. Loved it.

review_data.title: Great place for both a drink or a lovely dinner!
review_data.content: I went to Gartenhof for a quick after-work drink with a friend and I absolutely adored this place. The outdoor terrasse is perfect for a nice and relaxed athmosphere, the service was good and the typical zurich-drink (the Hugo) is a no miss!

review_data.title: Schön für ein Sommerdinner
review_data.content: Der Garten bietet eine sehr schöne Atmosphäre. Die Preise waren zwar hoch aber das Essen war sehr lecker. Zu empfehlen!

review_data.title: Great seasonal kitchen
